blueprint_book.label: [font=count-font][color=orange]Inline [virtual-signal=signal-item-parameter] Providers[/color][/font]
blueprint_book.description:
Premade stations for the recommended train configs.
Inset into straight rail for extra compactness.
Not recommended in places where you might want to change the railway layout in the future.

Bufferless "works", but they can be quite reliant on stackers which these inline versions don't offer, though nothing stops you from extending them to add one.
